RumorFact.Text: Nomai named Root and Poke discussed the possibility of using the Ash Twin Project to duplicate themselves while they installed the project's advanced warp core.

ExploreFact.Text: A Nomai named Poke considered what would happen if someone entered the core of the Ash Twin Project when it activated. She believed it would create some kind of temporal clone, causing an increase in the clan's population during the next loop.
